contentrichtext.text: {{italictitle}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Calumma | image = Calumma Parsonii Ste Marie Madagascar.jpg | image_caption = ''[[Calumma parsonii]]'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | subordo = [[Lacertilia]] | familia = [[Chamaeleonidae]] | subfamilia = [[Chamaeleoninae]] | genus = '''''Calumma''''' | genus_authority = [[John Edward Gray|Gray]], 1865 }} '''''Calumma''''' is a [[genus]] of [[chameleon]]s where all species are [[Endemism|endemic]] to [[Madagascar]]. Following [[CITES]], it is now illegal to import any of the species from their native countries. ==Classification of genus ''Calumma''== * ''[[Calumma amber]]'' * ''[[Calumma andringitraense]]'' * Boettger's chameleon, ''[[Calumma boettgeri]]'' * Short-horned chameleon, ''[[Calumma brevicorne]]'' * Madagascar chameleon, ''[[Calumma capuroni]]'' * Blue-legged chameleon ''[[Calumma crypticum]]'' * [[Hooded chameleon]], ''C. cucullatum'' * [[Deceptive chameleon]], ''C. fallax'' * Forked chameleon, ''[[Calumma furcifer]]'' * Blade chameleon, ''[[Calumma gallus]]'' * [[Perinet chameleon]], ''C. gastrotaenia'' * ''[[Calumma glawi]]'' * [[Globe-horned chameleon]] or flat-casqued chameleon, ''C. globifer'' * Guibe's chameleon, ''[[Calumma guibei]]'' * ''[[Calumma guillaumeti]]'' * ''[[Calumma hafahafa]]'' * ''[[Calumma hilleniusi]]'' * ''[[Calumma jejy]]'' * Yellow-green chameleon, ''[[Calumma malthe]]'' * ''[[Calumma marojezense]]'' * Big-nosed chameleon, ''[[Calumma nasutum]]'' * O'Shaughnessy's chameleon, ''[[Calumma oshaughnessyi]]'' * [[Parson's chameleon]], ''C. parsonii'' * ''[[Calumma peltierorum]]'' * Brygoo's chameleon, ''[[Calumma peyrierasi]]'' * ''[[Calumma tarzan]]'' * Tsaratanan chameleon, ''[[Calumma tsaratananense]]'' * ''[[Calumma tsycorne]]'' * ''[[Calumma vatosoa]]'' * ''[[Calumma vencesi]]'' * ''[[Calumma vohibola]]'' ==References== * {{cite book | last=Glaw | first=Frank | coauthors=Vences, Miguel | title=A Field Guide to Amphibians and Reptiles of Madagascar, 2nd edition | publisher=M. Vences & F. Glaw Verlags GbR | date=1994 | location=KÃ¶ln | isbn=3-929449-01-3 }} * Anderson, C. V. (2006). ''[http://chameleonnews.com/index.php?page=article&id=24 Captive Chameleon Populations.]'' Accessed 23-01-2009 [dead link] [[Category:Chameleons]] {{chameleon-stub}}
